revised_title: Anatomy and Development of Secondary Carpals, Metacarpals, and Digital Rays in Carinate Birds
tldr: The author examines the anatomy and development of secondary carpals, metacarpals, and digital rays in carinate birds, providing insights into their evolution and relationship to ancient reptiles. The study reveals the complexity of bird wings and the changes that occur during their development, shedding light on the origins of these fascinating creatures.
